tags: the glorious day draco discovers porn
summary:
Draco: Potter, you know those long muggle pictures with sound?
Harry: Videos, yeah.
Draco: Well listen to this, did you know...
body:
Draco: Potter, you know those long muggle pictures with sound?

Harry: Videos, yeah.

Draco: Well listen to this, did you know that in some of them they have sex?

Harry: I knew this day would come, give me the laptop.

Draco: You can see everything.

blog.name: niceness6of9gemini
blog.title: Hogwarts Mystery: The Cursed Crusaders
blog.description: Damon Isaac McCall Jr.•24 •Spiritual ॐ •Eclectic Witch🌒🌕🌘 •Nature 🌲🌻🍄🌻🌲 •Gemini Rising ♊👾♊️ •Virgo Moon ♍️🌕♍️ • Columbia, MD🌃 •Empath 🔮 •

summary:
Merula: So...you’re oddly peppy today. It’s creepy.
Isaac: Peppy? What does that even mean?
Merula: I mean I would assume with...
body:
Merula: So…you’re oddly peppy today. It’s creepy.

Isaac: Peppy? What does that even mean?

Merula: I mean I would assume with all the drama going on you wouldn’t be so…level headed.

Isaac: Can we not right now?

Merula: Be honest, Rose. When was the last time you talked to her?

Isaac: It’s not your concern, Snyde.

Merula: It is when Rakepick made you, I and Weasley a unit. We have a pact and you keep to that oath.

Isaac: It’s been 2 days since we talked. She would leave class early after claiming her assignments and she would never show up for dinner. Tonks is the only person I rely on to even find out how’s she’s doing. It’s frustrating.

Merula: Look you tell a soul that I’m you this I will rip off your skin and shape them to leather boots.

Isaac: Whatever! What?

Merula: I…I now see what you go through. Penny might lose her sister in a painting and Merlin knows that your brother might be in the last Cursed Vault so yes I agree, it’s difficult to be away from close family.

Isaac: Are your parents safe?

Merula: Let’s not talk about that. Look Rose, if we’re going to be a team then we have to learn to trust each other more. No matter how gross it is.

Isaac: Shut up.

Merula: Whoa…perhaps I heard you wrong. You, the great curse breaker Isaac Rose, asking me for help?

Isaac: Ok, lets not be dramatic.

Merula: I don’t know weather to blush or to vomit. Good thing I didn’t eat.

Isaac: 😔

Merula: Anyways, why specially my help Rose? And be honest.

Isaac: E-earn it?!

Merula: Well Yes you idiot. If you want my help, Then I want something in return.

Isaac: Alright, What?

Merula: I want you to praise me.

Isaac: WHATTT?!

Merula: (getting a tad Seductive) I want you to label me the most powerful witch in Hogwarts. And I wand you to say it correctly.

Merula: Girl you are scaring me.

blog.description:
Header image by @scarlet47 [PERMISSION BY ARTIST GRANTED]

This blog is a Bottom!Draco blog Only. Feel free to send prompts and and suggestions. I would be posting NSFW, one-shots, prompts and more.

Side Pairings that’ll appear: Pansmione, Roneville, Wolfstar, Linny.

tags: dramatic draco is the best draco
summary:
Draco, stops knitting to look out onto the setting sun: When will my husband return from the war.
Harry, from the front yard: I...
body:
Draco, stops knitting to look out onto the setting sun: When will my husband return from the war.

Harry, from the front yard: I TOLD YOU IM JUST GOING TO TESCO, STOP BEING SO DRAMATIC!

Draco, sighs as he releases his handkerchief into the wind: Be safe my love, be safe.

reblog.comment:

Draco, sighs as he releases his handkerchief into the wind: Be safe my love, be safe.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Harry is walking home through the park at 2am after an intense study session, and he encounters a drunk, emotional Tom...
body: Prompt: Harry is walking home through the park at 2am after an intense study session, and he encounters a drunk, emotional Tom Riddle. Harry, being Harry, decides he has to walk drunk Tom home, and all the while Tom tries to “recruit” Harry into his study group, promising that they are going to take over the world, so Harry has to accept now while they are still mostly unknown, because in a few years people will be begging to join Tom’s group. Harry mostly finds this amusing.

title: Just Friends
body:
by The_Hawk_Eye

We would be friends forever.

Any time I think about us, I can only remember the good times; when we laughed together; when we were planning our adventures together.

Words: 891, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Ron Weasley (mentioned), Hermione Granger (mentioned), Ginny Weasley (mentioned)
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Ron Weasley, Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley (background), Hermione Granger/Ron Weasley (background)
  • Additional Tags: Unrequited Love, Angst, POV Harry Potter

Read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CwPhcf

blog.name: twofingerswhiskey
blog.title: rolls-royce camper van
blog.description:
my name is jebediah!
adhd/dpd/fibromyalgia awareness!
british columbia. 23. he/they. pan. ftm.
my ask is open! i'd love if you sent one!
i create cc and make machinima for the sims 2. i like halt and catch fire, wtnv, bates motel, lis, orphan black, doctor who, sense8, the oa, spn, stranger things, htgawm, scandal, orbiting human circus, and hamilton. i also am into film photography, old games, old cars, dead formats, obscure youtubers, and video editing. i dabble with computer building, audio stuff, and digital art. half the things you love were filmed near my house.
my partner ash
peter
olivia
charlie
marina
cecil
colton
natalie
pre


(get these icons)

summary: i would write a dissertation on how jk rowling did not confirm that wizards shat themselves and magicked it away but honestly...
body: i would write a dissertation on how jk rowling did not confirm that wizards shat themselves and magicked it away but honestly yammering on about how much of the stories took place in washrooms leads me to another point: who the fuck plumbed that castle. did they just get johnny j. loo to come in with some PVC and flushers??? do they call mr rooter when moaning myrtle causes more trouble?? filch is NOT paid enough to deal with hagrid’s outhouse overflowing

Incorrect Tomarry
Quotes
blog.description: if y'all gonna send me asks asking "why" can y'all please elaborate a bit more I do a lot of questionable things and don't know what you're referring to

summary:

Harry: It’s the anxiety.

summary: When you procrastinate doing homework & studying so much and then one night you wake up in a heart stampeding panic because you...
body: When you procrastinate doing homework & studying so much and then one night you wake up in a heart stampeding panic because you forgot to revise for Transfiguration and then you remember you don’t take Transfiguration and then you’re like why don’t I take Transfiguration and then the salty water starts to run from your eyes as you remember it’s because you don’t go to Hogwarts and then you begin to drown in your own tears as you realise that Hogwarts actually doesn’t (probably, I’m still holding out hope) exist and you will never meet any of those people and then you think of all the actual people you’ll never meet and yeah has anyone else experienced this

blog.name: incorrect-professors
blog.title: incorrect hogwarts professor quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by the professors of hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry. (brought to you by the admins of incorrect-marauders.)

summary:
[IN THE AFTERLIFE]
Snape: So, how’d you convince all of them to betray me? What’d you offer them?
Dumbledore: I asked them if...
body:
[IN THE AFTERLIFE]
Snape: So, how’d you convince all of them to betray me? What’d you offer them?
Dumbledore: I asked them if they wanted to embarrass you, and they instantly said yes.

dialogue.name: Snape
dialogue.label: Snape:
dialogue.phrase: So, how’d you convince all of them to betray me? What’d you offer them?

dialogue.name: Dumbledore
dialogue.label: Dumbledore:
dialogue.phrase: I asked them if they wanted to embarrass you, and they instantly said yes.

blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
Sirius: My God, Remus, stop WOLFING down your food like that!
Remus: Please stop DOGGING me, Padfoot.
James: That is a...
body:
Sirius: My God, Remus, stop WOLFING down your food like that!
Remus: Please stop DOGGING me, Padfoot.
James: That is a STAGGERING amount of food you're eating, Remus. And please stop stealing my food, Peter.
Peter: RATS.

dialogue.name: Sirius
dialogue.label: Sirius:
dialogue.phrase: My God, Remus, stop WOLFING down your food like that!

dialogue.name: James
dialogue.label: James:
dialogue.phrase: That is a STAGGERING amount of food you're eating, Remus. And please stop stealing my food, Peter.

blog.name: flexitarianfandom
blog.title: why not?
blog.description: Fandom Flexitarian. Trying to log every fic I read. Mostly Sherlock BBC, with a fair amount of Merlin, Marvel, and Check Please with a little Inception thrown in for flavor. Fandom of fic in the tags.

summary:
Show
          Chapter
        |
        Archive of Our Own
body:
Show Chapter | Archive of Our Own

Swung by Serafim

flamethrower

Summary:

In 1993, Gilderoy Lockhart points a stolen wand at Harry Potter and Ron Weasley with the intent to Obliviate them.

The wand doesn’t backfire. Gilderoy’s “discovery” of the Chamber of Secrets is a short-term success.

Other consequences are not short-term at all.

Wow, this was an epic. Really good, funny in all the best ways. Despite the tag for Major Character Death, it’s a canonical death. Not really any ships to mention.
